topolearn.persistence.plandscape module¶

class topolearn.persistence.plandscape.PersistenceLandscape[source]¶

Bases: object

fit(pairs, dim=1, resolution=100, max_m=None)[source]¶

Find the persistence landscape for a homology dimension

Parameters

  • pairs (_type_) – _description_

  • dim (int, optional) – _description_, by default 1

  • resolution (int, optional) – _description_, by default 100

  • max_m (float, optional) – Maximum value for the landscape function. Used to find the grid resolution, if the values are used for statistics or comparison, these should be set to a shared value for all the landscapes.

Returns

Matrix with persistence landscape values

Return type

matrix
